about_the_game:
Greedy, a great devil that has lived for a thousand years, was turned into a sealed crystal when mining some gold. He summons you to this world to help him protect the crystal. But you are too weak, you need to build towers to fight against the monster. But your greed confuses Greedy, you are Greedy or I am Greedy???.

Waves of monsters will attack your base periodically. After some easy waves, you will meet a harder wave. You need to explore maps, harvest unlimited resources, upgrade your character's attributes, and build and upgrade defense towers.
However, harvesting resources will increase the Disaster Level, making the monsters increasingly stronger. Therefore, you must ensure that you can defend against monster waves before harvesting too many resources.

You can also grow crops, trade, and challenge special monster waves to gather unique resources. A high Disaster Level will unlock additional features and new towers.

Planned features for future versions:

- A city map that allows you to interact with NPCs, give gifts, and receive quests.

- Stronger tower upgrades, including mutated towers.

- Equipment and equipment upgrades.

- Combat skills for the character.

- Completing special challenges to enhance character attributes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 and 64 bits)
  • Processor: INTEL, AMD 2 cores CPU at 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD3000, Radeon, Nvidia card with shader model 3, 1GB video ram.
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 and 64 bits)
  • Processor: INTEL. AMD 4 cores CPU at 3Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon 7950 or above, Nvidia GTX 670 or above. 4GB video ram.
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: This is a tower defense and RPG game, harvests resources, explores the world, finds new towers, collects rare material, builds and updates towers, and defends against monsters. But the more resources you harvest, the stronger the monster.
